animeTitle: Lucky Me: I Secretly Cultivated for 1,000 Years
otherNames: Lucky Me: I Secretly Cultivated for 1000 Years, Providencia de Primer Nivel: Cultiva en Silencio Durante Miles de Años, Top Tier Providence - Secretly Cultivate for a Thousand Years, Top Tier Providence: Secretly Cultivate for a Thousand Years, Top-Notch
synopsis: Reborn in the cultivation world, Han Jue found that he could actually roll the dice to refresh his Spiritual Root Attributes and Innate Talents, just like in a game. To live long enough, Han Jue decided to practice his cultivation secretly and not to draw anyone’s attention, but when the sect he was in encountered a calamity, he came forward. Thousands of years later, the cultivators in the cultivation world had changed from generation to generation. When the immortal world decided to “clean up” the mortal world, Han Jue had to stand out against it. Only then did he realize that it seemed the immortals were not as powerful as he had imagined.
